com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.order

Interface IRenderOrder.IOrderNavigator

  • Enclosing interface:
    IRenderOrder

    public static interface IRenderOrder.IOrderNavigator
    Can be used to navigate through the layers and positions of a render order.

    All navigation methods return whether the navigator is at a valid position.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • navigateTo

        boolean navigateTo(int index,
                   double position)
        Navigates to the given order index and layer position.

        If the index is empty or invalid, or there is no such position in the layer, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Parameters:
        index - The order index to navigate to.
        position - The layer position to navigate to.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.

      • navigateTo

        boolean navigateTo(String layer,
                   double position)
        Navigates to the given order index and layer position.

        If there is no such layer or position, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Parameters:
        layer - The name of the layer to navigate to.
        position - The layer position to navigate to.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If layer is null.

      • navigateToNextIndex

        boolean navigateToNextIndex()
        Navigates to the next layer index. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If this index is empty or invalid, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToPreviousIndex

        boolean navigateToPreviousIndex()
        Navigates to the previous layer index. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If this index is empty or invalid, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToNextLayer

        boolean navigateToNextLayer()
        Navigates to the next non-empty index. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If there is no next layer, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid (there is a next layer), false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToPreviousLayer

        boolean navigateToPreviousLayer()
        Navigates to the previous non-empty index. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If there is no previous layer, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid (there is a previous layer), false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToBottomLayer

        boolean navigateToBottomLayer()
        Navigates to the bottom layer. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If the bottom layer has no calls, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position if valid, false if not.

      • navigateToTopLayer

        boolean navigateToTopLayer()
        Navigates to the top layer. The current position will be set to the first layer position.

        If the top layer has no calls, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.

      • navigateToNextPosition

        boolean navigateToNextPosition()
        Navigates to the next position in the current layer.

        If there is no next position, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToPreviousPosition

        boolean navigateToPreviousPosition()
        Navigates to the previous position in the current layer.

        If there is no previous position, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToNextValidPosition

        boolean navigateToNextValidPosition()
        Navigates to the next valid position in the render order.

        If the current stack has no next position the navigator, will move to the next non-empty layer first. If there is no such layer, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid (there is a next position), false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToPreviousValidPosition

        boolean navigateToPreviousValidPosition()
        Navigates to the previous valid position in the render order.

        If the current stack has no previous position, the navigator will move to the previous non-empty layer first. If there is no such layer, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid (there is a previous position), false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • navigateToFirstValidPosition

        boolean navigateToFirstValidPosition()
        Navigates to the first valid position in the render order.

        If there are no calls in the navigator's order, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the current position is valid, false if it's not.

      • navigateToLastValidPosition

        boolean navigateToLastValidPosition()
        Navigates to the last valid position in the render order. If there are no calls in the navigator's order, the current position will be set to invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the current position is valid, false if it's not.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        True if the current position is valid, false if not.

      • getCurrentIndex

        int getCurrentIndex()
        Returns:
        The current layer index.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • getCurrentLayer

        String getCurrentLayer()
        Returns:
        The layer for the current index.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • getCurrentStack

        IRenderLayerStack getCurrentStack()
        Returns:
        The stack for the current index.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • getCurrentPosition

        double getCurrentPosition()
        Returns:
        The current position in the current layer.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.

      • getCurrentCallback

        IRenderCallback getCurrentCallback()
        Returns:
        The callback for the current position.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current position is invalid.
